trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.UnhandledException" name="My.Application.UnhandledException" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.UnhandledException" name="My.Application.UnhandledException" href=""></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException> event occurs when an unhandled exception occurs in an application that implements the Visual Basic Application Model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>實作 Visual Basic 應用程式模型應用程式中發生未處理的例外狀況時，就會發生事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: UnhandledExceptionEventArgs contains the <xref:System.Exception> that occurred and indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 包含 UnhandledExceptionEventArgs<xref:System.Exception>的發生，表示應用程式是否應該結束例外狀況處理常式時結束。</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException> event occurs when an unhandled exception occurs in an application that implements the Visual Basic Application Model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>實作 Visual Basic 應用程式模型應用程式中發生未處理的例外狀況時，就會發生事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Exception> that occurred and indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs>包含<xref:System.Exception>的發生，表示應用程式是否應該結束例外狀況處理常式時結束。</xref:System.Exception></xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>，指出是否應該結束例外狀況處理常式時結束應用程式。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否應該結束例外狀況處理常式時結束應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic Application Model checks the value of this property after running the handlers of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 應用程式模型之後執行的處理常式中檢查這個屬性的值<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: If ExitApplication is `True`, then the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 ExitApplication `True`，然後在應用程式結束。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the application continues to run.
trans-unit.target: 否則，應用程式會繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Basic 應用程式模型概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the application should exit upon exiting the exception handler.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>，指出是否應該結束例外狀況處理常式時結束應用程式。</xref:System.Boolean>
